text:
On MacOS X many editors etc. add a 'resource fork' to all files. That 
resource fork is named like the original file with a '._' prefix. Hence Ant 
should add the pattern **/._* into it's set of Default Excludes. Better yet: 
The user should be able to change the default excludes (maybe through 
an environment variable or so).

Gerd
creator: gerti-apache@bitart.com

text: ant-dev, any objections to adding this into the default exclude pattern list?
creator: umagesh@apache.org
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
How about we find a generalized solution so that default excludes can be 
updated dynamically (perhaps based on a property setting?) rather than being 
completely hard-coded?

I'm +1 on adding this one, but would rather us make it extensible in the 
process.

Excellent idea Erik. Otherwise chances is that some of the default will be ok 
for one person and not for another.

fileset.excludes.default ?
